items.text: googly, hurriedly defended back after backing away
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: floated up outside off, reaches out for a drive and inside-edges to the pad
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: defended off the backfoot down the pitch
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: reaches forward to push at it and gets beaten
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: full outside off, defended back
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: stays back to a length ball and defends
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Abu Hider, no run

items.text: length, tucked away with the turn to midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Abu Hider, no run

items.text: closes the face to a fuller one and gets a leading edge to point
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Abu Hider, no run

items.text: spins down the leg side
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Abu Hider, 1 wide

items.text: stands tall and punches to mid-off
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Abu Hider, no run

items.text: tucked to backward square leg with the turn
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Abu Hider, no run

items.text: nudges a fuller one to backward square leg
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Abu Hider, no run

items.text: full on middle, pushed back
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: waits for it to turn and taps it to point
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: straight length ball, blocked from the crease
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: googly, spins in and raps the pad as he plays down the wrong line. Might've spun down leg
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: gets down for a slog and mistimes it one-bounce to deep square leg
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.text: drills a fuller one to cover
items.postText: Vishal's back for the final passage as the game tapers to its end.
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Abu Hider, no run

items.preText: Two wickets to go, maximum four fielders allowed outside the circle now
items.text: flighted on the stumps, he blocks it back
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: looked like he wanted to g for a big shot first and then decided to defend the length ball on the stumps
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: gets a full toss this time towards the pads and goes for the big shot this time, smashing it between deep midwicket and long on for four
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mosaddek Hossain, FOUR runs

items.text: tries a slog across the line and gets a single on the leg side
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.text: accurate line and length on middle and leg, he defends it back
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Abu Hider, no run

items.text: just outside off stump this time, he punches it back
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Abu Hider, no run

items.text: straightish on the stumps, he stays back and defends
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, no run
